name: Seek Edge
description:
Latest Version: 3.4.5

File Size: < 1 GB

Check out here for latest news!

Controls:

  • WASD/Left stick - Move
  • Space/South Button - Jump (Cross)
  • LMB/Right Trigger  - Fire
  • RMB/Left Trigger - Aim
  • Left Alt/North Button (Triangle) - Swap Weapons
  • Mouse Scroll - Scroll Weapons
  • Left Ctrl/East Button (Circle) - Crouch 
  • R/West Button (Square) - Reload 
  • Tab/Touchpad (PS4) /View (Xbox One) - Scoreboard
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • E/Dpad Up - Interaction (Hold 1 second for barricade)

Know of issues:

  • UI Interaction popup is not showing.
  • You can skip the first floor, by jump to side of the stairs.
  •  Input of UI seems bit off. (Restart game and try again)
  • A lot of things is not implemented (Multiplayer, server calls, heartbeat sensor, pooling system, mystery box), this is all I could do in one week!
